data.lyric:
[ti:Kiss Somebody]
[ar:Morgan Evans]
[al:Kiss Somebody]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Kiss Somebody - Morgan Evans
[00:01.06]Written by：Josh Osborne/Morgan Evans/Chris DeStefano
[00:02.13]Sometimes you gotta drink about somebody
[00:05.20]
[00:07.78]But that ain't goin' bring 'em back
[00:10.68]
[00:13.00]Sometimes you gotta cry and miss somebody
[00:15.90]
[00:19.19]Yea we've all felt like that
[00:21.72]
[00:23.89]If it's something that you gotta get over but you just can't get over
[00:27.80]Sometimes you gotta kiss somebody
[00:30.52]In the back of a cab or on a subway train
[00:33.13]Sometimes you gotta kiss somebody
[00:36.01]On a midnight street in the summer rain
[00:38.64]If you're wishing you were with somebody
[00:41.16]'Cause you don't wanna go home when it's closin' time
[00:44.05]If you wanna kiss somebody
[00:46.36]
[00:47.44]Baby I got somebody in mind
[00:50.74]You can kiss like your heart ain't ever been broke
[00:53.42]The kind of lips that your lips get your eyes to close
[00:56.27]I know just what you're goin' through
[00:59.09]'Cause I wanna kiss somebody too
[01:01.55]
[01:02.64]Kiss somebody like you I wanna kiss somebody like you
[01:07.58]
[01:12.73]Sometimes you try to fix somebody
[01:15.28]
[01:17.87]Just to find out they'll never change
[01:20.76]
[01:23.28]So you go out and meet somebody
[01:26.36]
[01:27.88]That makes you feel the way you thought you'd never feel again
[01:32.61]Sometimes you gotta kiss somebody
[01:34.92]
[01:35.46]In the back of a cab or on a subway train
[01:38.05]Sometimes you gotta kiss somebody
[01:40.73]On a midnight street in the summer rain
[01:43.54]If you're wishin' you were with somebody
[01:46.04]'Cause you don't wanna go home when it's closin' time
[01:49.12]If you wanna kiss somebody
[01:51.09]
[01:52.20]Baby I got somebody in mind
[01:55.53]You can kiss like your heart ain't ever been broke
[01:58.02]The kind of lips that your lips get your eyes to close
[02:00.88]I know just what you're goin' through
[02:03.99]'Cause I wanna kiss somebody too
[02:06.42]
[02:07.42]Kiss somebody like you I wanna kiss somebody like you
[02:12.29]
[02:13.22]Yeah yeah
[02:14.59]
[02:16.28]Oh girl loses boy the best friend with ease
[02:19.27]Girl meets boy girl don't make it harder than it has to be
[02:23.58]Come and lay one on me
[02:26.53]
[02:27.90]Hmm hmm
[02:29.74]
[02:30.49]You can kiss like your heart ain't ever been broke
[02:33.15]The kind of lips that your lips get your eyes to close
[02:36.36]Yeah I know what you're goin' through I do
[02:40.12]So come on and kiss somebody
[02:42.74]In the back of the cab or on the subway train
[02:45.66]Come on and kiss somebody
[02:48.14]On the midnight street in the summer rain
[02:51.15]If you're wishin' you were with somebody
[02:53.39]'Cause you don't wanna go home when it's closing time
[02:56.50]If you wanna kiss somebody
[02:58.51]

[03:05.50]The kind of lips that get your eyes to close

data.trans:
[ti:Kiss Somebody]
[ar:Morgan Evans]
[al:Kiss Somebody]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:01.06]//
[00:02.13]有时你会买醉 试图忘记某个人
[00:05.20]
[00:07.78]但这并不能让他重回你身边
[00:10.68]
[00:13.00]有时你会因为思念某人 而泪流满面
[00:15.90]
[00:19.19]是的 我们都有这样的经历
[00:21.72]
[00:23.89]如果你也有无法遗忘 但又必须遗忘的人
[00:27.80]有时 你必须与某个人忘情拥吻
[00:30.52]在出租车后座上 或者在地铁上
[00:33.13]有时 你必须与某个人忘情拥吻
[00:36.01]在午夜的街道上 或是在夏雨里
[00:38.64]你多希望你能和你的爱人在一起啊
[00:41.16]即使到了宵禁的时间 你也不想回家
[00:44.05]如果你想和某个人忘情亲吻
[00:46.36]
[00:47.44]宝贝 我想到了一个人
[00:50.74]你可以与他忘情亲吻 就像你的心从未支离破碎
[00:53.42]那种感觉会使你情不自禁 闭上双眼
[00:56.27]我明白你的感觉
[00:59.09]因为我也渴望忘情拥吻
[01:01.55]
[01:02.64]和像你这样的人忘情拥吻 我渴望和像你这样的人忘情拥吻
[01:07.58]
[01:12.73]有时 你试图改变他人
[01:15.28]
[01:17.87]但却发现江山易改 禀性难移
[01:20.76]
[01:23.28]因此 你走出门去 遇见了另一个人
[01:26.36]
[01:27.88]他带给你前所未有的感觉
[01:32.61]有时 你必须与某个人忘情拥吻
[01:34.92]
[01:35.46]在出租车后座上 或者在地铁上
[01:38.05]有时 你必须与某个人忘情拥吻
[01:40.73]在午夜的街道上 或是在夏季的暴雨中
[01:43.54]你多希望你能和你的爱人在一起啊
[01:46.04]即使到了宵禁的时间 你也不想回家
[01:49.12]如果你想和某个人忘情亲吻
[01:51.09]
[01:52.20]宝贝 我想到了一个人
[01:55.53]你可以和他忘情拥吻 就像你的心从未支离破碎
[01:58.02]那种感觉会使你情不自禁 闭上双眼
[02:00.88]我明白你的感觉
[02:03.99]因为我也渴望忘情拥吻
[02:06.42]
[02:07.42]和像你这样的人忘情拥吻 我渴望和像你这样的人忘情拥吻
[02:12.29]
[02:13.22]//
[02:14.59]
[02:16.28]这个女孩失去了这个男孩 他曾是她最好的朋友
[02:19.27]当这个女孩遇见另一个男孩 艰难的生活似乎也变得美好起来
[02:23.58]来吧 让我遇到我的命中注定吧
[02:26.53]
[02:27.90]//
[02:29.74]
[02:30.49]你可以和他忘情拥吻 就像你的心从未支离破碎
[02:33.15]那种感觉会使你情不自禁 闭上双眼
[02:36.36]是的 我了解那种感觉 我真的了解
[02:40.12]因此来吧 和某人忘情拥吻吧
[02:42.74]在车后座上 或者在地铁上
[02:45.66]来吧 和某人忘情拥吻吧
